text: 1:15 Onger Akaba 31:18; Malakai 3:13A gumazamiziba bar men araziba tuisɨgham. Gumazamizir an gɨn zuir puvatɨziba, a me damutɨ, me bar uan arazir kurar me amizibar osɨmtɨziba ateram. Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me akɨrim ragha God gasa ghuavɨra iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, akar bar kurar igharazir me God gamiziba bangɨn, God me damutɨ, me bar ivezir kuram iniam.”
